Description: The Most Merciful, whose mercy encompasses all aspects of existence, providing sustenance and guidance to all creation.
The Most Compassionate, whose compassion is infinite and constant, particularly towards those who seek His guidance and forgiveness.
The Absolute Ruler, possessing complete authority and control over all affairs, sovereign over the universe.
The Pure One, absolutely pure and free from any imperfections or flaws, sanctified and holy.
The Source of Peace, providing tranquility to those who seek it in submission to His will, the ultimate source of peace.
The Bestower of Faith, granting faith and security to believers, ensuring their hearts are tranquil and steadfast.
The Guardian, protector and guardian of all, overseeing everything with perfect knowledge and wisdom.
The Almighty, mighty and powerful, His strength and authority are unmatched, exalted in power.
The Compeller, mends what is broken, heals what is sick, and fills what is empty, enforcing His will with irresistible force.
The Supreme, exalted and supreme, free from all imperfections and deficiencies, the ultimate in greatness.
The Creator, bringing existence from nothingness, creating everything according to His will.
The Evolver, fashioner of all things, shaping them in perfection according to His will, the originator and designer.
The Fashioner, designer and shaper of all forms, giving each creation its unique appearance and features.
The Forgiving, forgiving all sins, offering mercy and redemption to those who repent and seek His forgiveness.
The Subduer, has the power to subdue and overcome all things, enforcing His will with irresistible force.
The Bestower, giver of gifts and blessings, bestowing His favors upon whom He wills, the ultimate giver.
The Provider, provider of sustenance to all creatures, ensuring their needs are met, the ultimate sustainer.
The Opener, opens doors of opportunity and solutions to problems, guiding His servants to success, the ultimate opener.
The All-Knowing, possessor of all knowledge, aware of the past, present, and future, the all-knowing.
The Constrictor, withholds and constricts, controlling all aspects of life and death, the one who withholds.
The Expander, opens and expands, granting abundance and ease to whom He wills, the ultimate expander.
The Abaser, lowers and debases, humbling those who exalt themselves above His command, the ultimate abaser.
The Exalter, raises and elevates, exalting those who humble themselves before Him, the ultimate exalter.
The Bestower of Honor, grants honor and dignity to whom He wills, elevating them in status and rank.
The Dishonorer, humiliates and debases, lowering those who reject His guidance and commands.
The All-Hearing, hears all sounds and voices, whether whispered or proclaimed, the all-hearing.
The All-Seeing, sees all things, whether apparent or hidden, the all-seeing.
The Judge, ultimate arbiter of justice, ruling with perfect wisdom and fairness, the ultimate judge.
The Utterly Just, acts with perfect justice and fairness, ensuring no one is wronged or oppressed.
The Subtle One, aware of the finest details and nuances, providing for all in ways that are gentle and kind.
The All-Aware, fully aware of all things, whether open or hidden, the all-knowing.
The Forbearing, patient and tolerant, delaying punishment for sins, giving time for repentance.
The Magnificent, magnificent and great, His grandeur and majesty are beyond imagination, the ultimate in greatness.
The Forgiver and Hider of Faults, forgives sins and conceals faults, granting mercy and forgiveness to those who repent.
The Rewarder of Thankfulness, appreciates and rewards even the smallest acts of kindness and gratitude.
The Most High, exalted and supreme, His greatness and loftiness are beyond comparison, the ultimate in height.
The Most Great, great and magnificent, His greatness and majesty are beyond comprehension, the ultimate in greatness.
The Preserver, preserves and protects all things, safeguarding them from harm and destruction.
The Nourisher, sustainer of all, providing nourishment and sustenance to all creatures, the ultimate sustainer.
The Reckoner, takes account of all actions, ensuring every deed is brought to light and accounted for.
The Majestic, majestic and honorable, His majesty and grandeur are beyond comparison, the ultimate in majesty.
The Generous, generous and bountiful, His generosity knows no bounds, the ultimate giver.
The Watchful, observes all things, recording every deed and action, the ultimate observer.
The Responsive, answers the prayers and supplications of those who call upon Him, the ultimate responder.
The Vast, vast and unlimited, His mercy and blessings are limitless, encompassing all of creation.
The Wise, possesses perfect wisdom, acting with wisdom and knowledge in all matters, the ultimate in wisdom.
The Loving, loving and affectionate, His love encompasses all of creation, the ultimate in love.
The Glorious, glorious and noble, His glory and nobility are beyond comparison, the ultimate in glory.
The Resurrector, raises the dead to life, bringing forth new life after death, the ultimate resurrection.
The Witness, witnesses all things, seeing everything that occurs, the ultimate witness.
The Truth, true and real in His essence, His existence and attributes are undeniable, the ultimate truth.
The Trustee, entrusted with the affairs of all creation, relying on Him for all needs and desires, the ultimate trustee.
The Strong, possesses ultimate strength and power, His might and power are unmatched, the ultimate in strength.
The Firm, firm and steadfast, His power and authority are unshakable, the ultimate in firmness.
The Protecting Friend, protects and guides His servants, providing them with security and support, the ultimate protector.
The Praiseworthy, worthy of all praise and glory, His attributes and actions are deserving of all praise.
The Accounter, counts and numbers all things, recording every detail and aspect, the ultimate counter.
The Originator, initiates and begins all creation, bringing forth existence from nothingness.
The Restorer, restores and returns all things to their original state, bringing back that which has passed away.
The Giver of Life, grants life to all creatures, bringing them into existence from nothingness.
The Bringer of Death, causes all things to die, ending their existence in this world.
The Ever-Living, possesses eternal life, His existence is everlasting and unending.
The Self-Existing, sustains and maintains all things, ensuring their continued existence and well-being.
